snippet.title: Sancticide - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sancticide is a melee-focused TPP action game with rogue-lite elements, set in a world of the biblical Apocalypse. The combat system based on spatial and directional awareness pays homage to the games of yore, while manipulating the environment and physically interacting with it expands tactical possibilities. 

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2635050/Sancticide/

The unique, twisted setting serves as a backdrop to the tale of Ezechiel - a fresh recruit to the Sin Collector Corps, haunted by remorse and guilt as he embarks on one of his most important missions yet. Explore the unforgiving world in which death is not the end, but merely another 

Follow us on Social: 
SANCTICIDE Facebook:   https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=61556617569000
RSG Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedSquareGames

CREDITS: 
Production Manager:  Sylen Studio S.A.
Produced by: Dash Dot Creations
CG supervisor/art director: Łukasz Kubiński
Producent: Mariusz Radomski
3d modeling/textures: Katarzyna Seńczuk, Joanna Kobierska, Daniil Nikulcha, Julia Zobniów, Jakub Wydro
Grooming: Andrey Didenko, Jarosław Handrysik
Lighting/shading/rendering: Lukasz Kubiński, Katarzyna Seńczuk, Andrey Didenko, Jakub Mrozek
Previs / Animation: Monika Migdalska, Andrey Didenko
Compositing: Marcin Woźniacki, Łukasz Kubiński, Hanna Pachurka, Krzysztof Opieka, Leon Ziemianowicz
Storyboard: Krzysztof Wolicki
2D Art: Michał Sztuka
2D Key Art: Jakub Mirocha
Music by: Patryk Scelina
Vocals: Magdalena Przychodzka
Sound Design: Kosma Kelm, Przemysław Moszczyński
